services.name: 30-minute intro call
services.description: Free discovery call to understand goals and see if it's a fit.

services.name: 60-minute 1:1 training session
services.description: Personal training tailored to strength, conditioning, and mobility.

policies.latePolicy: If you're more than 15 minutes late, the session may need to be rescheduled.
policies.notes: Remote and in-person options are available. Payment is handled after booking.

services.name: Men's haircut
services.description: Classic or modern cuts, wash optional.

services.name: Skin fade + beard trim
services.description: High/low fades plus detailed beard line-up.

policies.latePolicy: If you're more than 10 minutes late, we may need to shorten or reschedule.
policies.notes: Cash or card accepted. Walk-ins welcome but appointments preferred.
